10 class SegmentationClient
11 {
12 public:
13  SegmentationClient(ros::NodeHandle* nodeHandle);
14  void cloudCallback(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2& msg);
15  void publishClouds();
16 private:
17  ros::NodeHandle nh_;
18  std::string cloud_topic_ = "/camera/depth_registered/points";
19  std::string segmentation_service_ = "segmentation_service";
20  ros::Subscriber sub_;
21  ros::Publisher table_cloud_pub_;
22  ros::Publisher object_cloud_pub_;
23  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 table_cloud_ros_;
24  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 object_cloud_ros_;

26 
27 SegmentationClient::SegmentationClient(ros::NodeHandle *nodeHandle):nh_(*nodeHandle){
28  sub_ = nh_.subscribe(cloud_topic_, 1, &SegmentationClient::cloudCallback, this);
29  table_cloud_pub_ = nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("table",10);
30  object_cloud_pub_ = nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("objects",10);
31 }
32 
33 void SegmentationClient::cloudCallback(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2& msg){
34  ros::ServiceClient client = nh_.serviceClient<segmentation_lccp::segmentation>(segmentation_service_);
35  segmentation_lccp::segmentation srv;
36  srv.request.input_cloud = msg;
37  if(client.call(srv)){
38  table_cloud_ros_ = srv.response.plane_cloud;
39  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> segmented_objects_cloud;
40  for(int i=0;i<srv.response.object_cloud.size();++i){
41  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> tmp;
42  pcl::fromROSMsg(srv.response.object_cloud[i], tmp);
43  float r = static_cast<float> (rand())/static_cast<float>(RAND_MAX);
44  float g = static_cast<float> (rand())/static_cast<float>(RAND_MAX);
45  float b = static_cast<float> (rand())/static_cast<float>(RAND_MAX);
46  for(int j=0;j<tmp.points.size();++j){
47  pcl::PointXYZRGB temp_point;
48  temp_point.x = tmp.points.at(j).x;
49  temp_point.y = tmp.points.at(j).y;
50  temp_point.z = tmp.points.at(j).z;
51  temp_point.r = r * 255;
52  temp_point.g = g * 255;
53  temp_point.b = b * 255;
54  segmented_objects_cloud.points.push_back(temp_point);
55  }
56  }
57  segmented_objects_cloud.width = segmented_objects_cloud.points.size();
58  segmented_objects_cloud.height =1;
59  segmented_objects_cloud.is_dense = true;
60  pcl::toROSMsg(segmented_objects_cloud, object_cloud_ros_);
61  object_cloud_ros_.header.seq = 1;
62  object_cloud_ros_.header.frame_id = msg.header.frame_id;
63  object_cloud_ros_.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
64  publishClouds();
65  }
66 }
67 
68 void SegmentationClient::publishClouds(){
69  table_cloud_pub_.publish(table_cloud_ros_);
70  object_cloud_pub_.publish(object_cloud_ros_);
71 }
72 
73 
74 int main(int argc, char **argv)
75 {
76  ros::init(argc, argv, "segmentation_lccp_client");
77  ros::NodeHandle nh;
78  SegmentationClient client(&nh);
79  ros::spin();
80  return 0;
81 }
